mapper.select: select goods.goods_id,goods_name,goods_information, goods_category_id,goods_cover_url,collect_num, sell_num,min(price) as low_price from goods,goods_specs where goods.goods_id=goods_specs.goods_id group by goods.goods_id,sell_num order by sell_num desc
mapper.update: update goods set sell_num=sell_num+#{num} where goods_id=#{good_id}
update goods set collect_num=collect_num+1 where goods_id=#{good_id}
update goods set collect_num=collect_num-1 where goods_id=#{good_id}
mapper.select: select goods_id from goods_specs where id = #{specId}
select id,stock,price from goods_specs where goods_id=#{good_id} and specs=#{specs}
select specs from goods_specs where goods_id=#{good_id}
select key_name from goods_attr_key where id=#{id}
select attr_key_id from goods_attr_value where id=#{id}
select specs from goods_specs where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update goods_specs set stock=stock-#{num} where id=#{id}
update goods_specs set stock=stock+#{num} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select goods.goods_id,goods_name,goods_information, goods_category_id,goods_cover_url,collect_num, sell_num,min(price) as low_price from goods,goods_specs where goods.goods_id=goods_specs.goods_id and goods_category_id=#{c_id} group by goods.goods_id
